Installation¶

Stable release¶

To install charmonium.cache, run this command in your terminal:

$ pip install charmonium.cache

If you don’t have pip installed, this Python installation guide can guide you through the process.

Dev build¶

The sources for charmonium.cache can be downloaded from the Github repo.

These sources can be installed with Poetry

$ git clone git@github.com:charmoniumQ/charmonium.cache.git
$ cd charmonium.cache
$ pip install poetry
$ poetry install

charmonium.cache
